name: ionbibtex
short_description:
The Institute of Navigation* (ION) is a technical society specialising in navigation-related topics.  The produce an academic journal and several conferences for both academia and industry.

Unfortunantly, they offer no "export citation" functionalty for those that manage their papers using BibTeX (or other citation manager).  This project is a simple screen scraper to extract the nessessary citation information and format it as a BibTeX citation.

---

* N.B. This project is not endorsed by, and is no way affiliated with ION.  I will gladly deprecate this project once the have a working "Export Citation" functionality.
summary: A BibTeX exporter for ION Journals and Conferences
